name: Peanut Gallery (FivePoint Arcade, dizmackay)
description: Peanut Gallery is targeted at young children who are not familiar with in-app advertisements and notifications that might prompt the player to inadvertently make an online purchase. The game is designed to be accessible for young people (4+) who are learning to use a device for the first time, the elderly, or a person who is recovering from an injury or illness and learning to regain mobility/motor skills.
